basics.name: Maxwell Pauly
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Computer Engineer B.S. '24 M.S. '25, focus in machine learning, computer architecture, processor and hardware design, performance engineering of software systems, robotic automation. My dream is to start a company so I'm considering a JD/MBA degree after graduating, but the Artificial Intelligence revolution is already here. Maybe I'll have to start a company out of grad school, or join a really cool startup.

courses: EE361 Computer and Digital System Design

Excellent work ethic and leadership skills
Technical and practical experience with various radio equipment and frequency planning
